channel.title: Commodities on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in Commodities on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: White Gold, Red Ink: Navigating the Great Lithium Hangover of 2025
item.description: A deep-dive analysis into the 2023-2025 lithium market crash, exploring the supply glut, China's supply chain dominance, the West's policy response, and the technological game-changers reshaping the industry.

item.title: Lithium's Great Game: Deconstructing the 'New OPEC' Myth and China's Stranglehold
item.description: A deep-dive analysis into the geopolitics of lithium, debunking the 'Lithium OPEC' theory by examining the fractured politics of South America's Lithium Triangle and exposing China's strategic dominance over the global supply chain.
